Havvest helps you build Wealth and achieve financial freedom by enabling you to save responsibly and invest in high-quality real estate projects.

Getting Started on Havvest

Account setup

Only 1 minute and you're in. Enter the information you need to become a HavVestor and start saving or investing right away

Select a plan that suits your budget

Select a standard plan, a project that suits your budget or a saving plan with a good duration and interest

Watch your investment grow

Invest and sit back. You can follow your investment status at any time and invest in limited time special offers

Payout Day

Your investment is eligible for withdrawal anytime after the first 24 hours
